name: Fonis Pinball
description:
A good old pinball, remade in a different style.

Use Left and Right Arrow Keys to shoot the ball in the air. High scores are saved locally.

This game was made as a team project for the student organization FONIS. August, 2022.

IMPORTANT: The game's resolution is broken on smaller screens. If that is the case for you, play this game on the following LINK.
